What if one practices mathematical science like music?

My goal is to spend four hours a day on [work with intent](https://lifes-work.netlify.com/).

For a sanity, efficiency, and inspiration, I intend to balance my time between three categories: 

- research, $\phi$; 
- skills, $\theta$; and 
- busywork, $\psi$.

This blog is loose notes on skills in R and statistics.  I am currently undertaking my doctorate in statistical meta-research, and often need to learn a particular tool. Blogging seems like an ideal way to force myself to summarise what I'm learning.
